37/*
38 * COLR -- Color

41#define HB_OT_TAG_COLR HB_TAG('C','O','L','R')

50struct COLR;
51
52struct Paint;
53
54struct hb_paint_context_t :
55 hb_dispatch_context_t<hb_paint_context_t>
56{
57 template <typename T>
58 return_t dispatch (const T &obj) { obj.paint_glyph (this); return hb_empty_t (); }
59 static return_t default_return_value () { return hb_empty_t (); }
60
61 const COLR* get_colr_table () const
62 { return reinterpret_cast<const COLR *> (base); }
63
64public:
65 const void *base;
66 hb_paint_funcs_t *funcs;
67 void *data;
68 hb_font_t *font;
69 unsigned int palette_index;
70 hb_color_t foreground;
71 VarStoreInstancer &instancer;
72 int depth_left = HB_MAX_NESTING_LEVEL;
73 int edge_count = HB_COLRV1_MAX_EDGE_COUNT;
74
75 hb_paint_context_t (const void *base_,
76 hb_paint_funcs_t *funcs_,
77 void *data_,
78 hb_font_t *font_,
79 unsigned int palette_,
80 hb_color_t foreground_,
81 VarStoreInstancer &instancer_) :
82 base (base_),
83 funcs (funcs_),
84 data (data_),
85 font (font_),
86 palette_index (palette_),
87 foreground (foreground_),
88 instancer (instancer_)
89 { }
90
91 hb_color_t get_color (unsigned int color_index, float alpha, hb_bool_t *is_foreground)
92 {
93 hb_color_t color = foreground;
94
95 *is_foreground = true;
96
97 if (color_index != 0xffff)
98 {
99 if (!funcs->custom_palette_color (paint_data: data, color_index, color: &color))
100 {
101 unsigned int clen = 1;
102 hb_face_t *face = hb_font_get_face (font);
103
104 hb_ot_color_palette_get_colors (face, palette_index, start_offset: color_index, color_count: &clen, colors: &color);
105 }
106
107 *is_foreground = false;
108 }
109
110 return HB_COLOR (hb_color_get_blue (color),
111 hb_color_get_green (color),
112 hb_color_get_red (color),
113 hb_color_get_alpha (color) * alpha);
114 }
115
116 inline void recurse (const Paint &paint);
117};
118
119struct hb_colrv1_closure_context_t :
120 hb_dispatch_context_t<hb_colrv1_closure_context_t>
121{
122 template <typename T>
123 return_t dispatch (const T &obj)
124 {
125 if (unlikely (nesting_level_left == 0))
126 return hb_empty_t ();
127
128 if (paint_visited (paint: &obj))
129 return hb_empty_t ();
130
131 nesting_level_left--;
132 obj.closurev1 (this);
133 nesting_level_left++;
134 return hb_empty_t ();
135 }
136 static return_t default_return_value () { return hb_empty_t (); }
137
138 bool paint_visited (const void *paint)
139 {
140 hb_codepoint_t delta = (hb_codepoint_t) ((uintptr_t) paint - (uintptr_t) base);
141 if (visited_paint.in_error() || visited_paint.has (k: delta))
142 return true;
143
144 visited_paint.add (g: delta);
145 return false;
146 }
147
148 const COLR* get_colr_table () const
149 { return reinterpret_cast<const COLR *> (base); }
150
151 void add_glyph (unsigned glyph_id)
152 { glyphs->add (g: glyph_id); }
153
154 void add_layer_indices (unsigned first_layer_index, unsigned num_of_layers)
155 { layer_indices->add_range (a: first_layer_index, b: first_layer_index + num_of_layers - 1); }
156
157 void add_palette_index (unsigned palette_index)
158 { palette_indices->add (g: palette_index); }
159
160 public:
161 const void *base;
162 hb_set_t visited_paint;
163 hb_set_t *glyphs;
164 hb_set_t *layer_indices;
165 hb_set_t *palette_indices;
166 unsigned nesting_level_left;
167
168 hb_colrv1_closure_context_t (const void *base_,
169 hb_set_t *glyphs_,
170 hb_set_t *layer_indices_,
171 hb_set_t *palette_indices_,
172 unsigned nesting_level_left_ = HB_MAX_NESTING_LEVEL) :
173 base (base_),
174 glyphs (glyphs_),
175 layer_indices (layer_indices_),
176 palette_indices (palette_indices_),
177 nesting_level_left (nesting_level_left_)
178 {}
179};
180
181struct LayerRecord
182{
183 operator hb_ot_color_layer_t () const { return {.glyph: glyphId, .color_index: colorIdx}; }
184
185 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
186 {
187 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
188 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
189 }
190
191 public:
192 HBGlyphID16 glyphId; /* Glyph ID of layer glyph */
193 Index colorIdx; /* Index value to use with a
194 * selected color palette.
195 * An index value of 0xFFFF
196 * is a special case indicating
197 * that the text foreground
198 * color (defined by a
199 * higher-level client) should
200 * be used and shall not be
201 * treated as actual index
202 * into CPAL ColorRecord array. */
203 public:
204 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4);
205};
206
207struct BaseGlyphRecord
208{
209 int cmp (hb_codepoint_t g) const
210 { return g < glyphId ? -1 : g > glyphId ? 1 : 0; }
211
212 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
213 {
214 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
215 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
216 }
217
218 public:
219 HBGlyphID16 glyphId; /* Glyph ID of reference glyph */
220 HBUINT16 firstLayerIdx; /* Index (from beginning of
221 * the Layer Records) to the
222 * layer record. There will be
223 * numLayers consecutive entries
224 * for this base glyph. */
225 HBUINT16 numLayers; /* Number of color layers
226 * associated with this glyph */
227 public:
228 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (6);
229};
230
231template <typename T>
232struct Variable
233{
234 static constexpr bool is_variable = true;
235
236 Variable<T>* copy (hb_serialize_context_t *c) const
237 {
238 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
239 return_trace (c->embed (this));
240 }
241
242 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
243 { value.closurev1 (c); }
244
245 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
246 {
247 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
248 if (!value.subset (c)) return_trace (false);
249 return_trace (c->serializer->embed (varIdxBase));
250 }
251
252 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
253 {
254 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
255 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && value.sanitize (c));
256 }
257
258 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
259 {
260 value.paint_glyph (c, varIdxBase);
261 }
262
263 void get_color_stop (hb_paint_context_t *c,
264 hb_color_stop_t *stop,
265 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
266 {
267 value.get_color_stop (c, stop, varIdxBase, instancer);
268 }
269
270 hb_paint_extend_t get_extend () const
271 {
272 return value.get_extend ();
273 }
274
275 protected:
276 T value;
277 public:
278 VarIdx varIdxBase;
279 public:
280 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + T::static_size);
281};
282
283template <typename T>
284struct NoVariable
285{
286 static constexpr bool is_variable = false;
287
288 static constexpr uint32_t varIdxBase = VarIdx::NO_VARIATION;
289
290 NoVariable<T>* copy (hb_serialize_context_t *c) const
291 {
292 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
293 return_trace (c->embed (this));
294 }
295
296 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
297 { value.closurev1 (c); }
298
299 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
300 {
301 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
302 return_trace (value.subset (c));
303 }
304
305 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
306 {
307 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
308 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && value.sanitize (c));
309 }
310
311 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
312 {
313 value.paint_glyph (c, varIdxBase);
314 }
315
316 void get_color_stop (hb_paint_context_t *c,
317 hb_color_stop_t *stop,
318 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
319 {
320 value.get_color_stop (c, stop, VarIdx::NO_VARIATION, instancer);
321 }
322
323 hb_paint_extend_t get_extend () const
324 {
325 return value.get_extend ();
326 }
327
328 T value;
329 public:
330 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (T::static_size);
331};
332
333// Color structures
334
335struct ColorStop
336{
337 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
338 { c->add_palette_index (palette_index: paletteIndex); }
339
340 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
341 {
342 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
343 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: *this);
344 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
345 return_trace (c->serializer->check_assign (out->paletteIndex, c->plan->colr_palettes.get (paletteIndex),
346 HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW));
347 }
348
349 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
350 {
351 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
352 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
353 }
354
355 void get_color_stop (hb_paint_context_t *c,
356 hb_color_stop_t *out,
357 uint32_t varIdx,
358 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
359 {
360 out->offset = stopOffset.to_float(offset: instancer (varIdx, 0));
361 out->color = c->get_color (color_index: paletteIndex,
362 alpha: alpha.to_float (offset: instancer (varIdx, 1)),
363 is_foreground: &out->is_foreground);
364 }
365
366 F2DOT14 stopOffset;
367 HBUINT16 paletteIndex;
368 F2DOT14 alpha;
369 public:
370 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (2 + 2 * F2DOT14::static_size);
371};
372
373struct Extend : HBUINT8
374{
375 enum {
376 EXTEND_PAD = 0,
377 EXTEND_REPEAT = 1,
378 EXTEND_REFLECT = 2,
379 };
380 public:
381 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (1);
382};
383
384template <template<typename> class Var>
385struct ColorLine
386{
387 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
388 {
389 for (const auto &stop : stops.iter ())
390 stop.closurev1 (c);
391 }
392
393 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
394 {
395 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
396 auto *out = c->serializer->start_embed (this);
397 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
398 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (out))) return_trace (false);
399
400 if (!c->serializer->check_assign (out->extend, extend, HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW)) return_trace (false);
401 if (!c->serializer->check_assign (out->stops.len, stops.len, HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_ARRAY_OVERFLOW)) return_trace (false);
402
403 for (const auto& stop : stops.iter ())
404 {
405 if (!stop.subset (c)) return_trace (false);
406 }
407 return_trace (true);
408 }
409
410 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
411 {
412 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
413 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
414 stops.sanitize (c));
415 }
416
417 /* get up to count stops from start */
418 unsigned int
419 get_color_stops (hb_paint_context_t *c,
420 unsigned int start,
421 unsigned int *count,
422 hb_color_stop_t *color_stops,
423 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
424 {
425 unsigned int len = stops.len;
426
427 if (count && color_stops)
428 {
429 unsigned int i;
430 for (i = 0; i < *count && start + i < len; i++)
431 stops[start + i].get_color_stop (c, &color_stops[i], instancer);
432 *count = i;
433 }
434
435 return len;
436 }
437
438 HB_INTERNAL static unsigned int static_get_color_stops (hb_color_line_t *color_line,
439 void *color_line_data,
440 unsigned int start,
441 unsigned int *count,
442 hb_color_stop_t *color_stops,
443 void *user_data)
444 {
445 const ColorLine *thiz = (const ColorLine *) color_line_data;
446 hb_paint_context_t *c = (hb_paint_context_t *) user_data;
447 return thiz->get_color_stops (c, start, count, color_stops, c->instancer);
448 }
449
450 hb_paint_extend_t get_extend () const
451 {
452 return (hb_paint_extend_t) (unsigned int) extend;
453 }
454
455 HB_INTERNAL static hb_paint_extend_t static_get_extend (hb_color_line_t *color_line,
456 void *color_line_data,
457 void *user_data)
458 {
459 const ColorLine *thiz = (const ColorLine *) color_line_data;
460 return thiz->get_extend ();
461 }
462
463 Extend extend;
464 Array16Of<Var<ColorStop>> stops;
465 public:
466 DEFINE_SIZE_ARRAY_SIZED (3, stops);
467};
468
469// Composition modes
470
471// Compositing modes are taken from https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/
472// NOTE: a brief audit of major implementations suggests most support most
473// or all of the specified modes.
474struct CompositeMode : HBUINT8
475{
476 enum {
477 // Porter-Duff modes
478 // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators
479 COMPOSITE_CLEAR = 0, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_clear
480 COMPOSITE_SRC = 1, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_src
481 COMPOSITE_DEST = 2, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_dst
482 COMPOSITE_SRC_OVER = 3, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_srcover
483 COMPOSITE_DEST_OVER = 4, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_dstover
484 COMPOSITE_SRC_IN = 5, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_srcin
485 COMPOSITE_DEST_IN = 6, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_dstin
486 COMPOSITE_SRC_OUT = 7, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_srcout
487 COMPOSITE_DEST_OUT = 8, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_dstout
488 COMPOSITE_SRC_ATOP = 9, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_srcatop
489 COMPOSITE_DEST_ATOP = 10, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_dstatop
490 COMPOSITE_XOR = 11, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_xor
491 COMPOSITE_PLUS = 12, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#porterduffcompositingoperators_plus
492
493 // Blend modes
494 // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blending
495 COMPOSITE_SCREEN = 13, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingscreen
496 COMPOSITE_OVERLAY = 14, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingoverlay
497 COMPOSITE_DARKEN = 15, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingdarken
498 COMPOSITE_LIGHTEN = 16, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendinglighten
499 COMPOSITE_COLOR_DODGE = 17, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingcolordodge
500 COMPOSITE_COLOR_BURN = 18, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingcolorburn
501 COMPOSITE_HARD_LIGHT = 19, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendinghardlight
502 COMPOSITE_SOFT_LIGHT = 20, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingsoftlight
503 COMPOSITE_DIFFERENCE = 21, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingdifference
504 COMPOSITE_EXCLUSION = 22, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingexclusion
505 COMPOSITE_MULTIPLY = 23, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingmultiply
506
507 // Modes that, uniquely, do not operate on components
508 // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingnonseparable
509 COMPOSITE_HSL_HUE = 24, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendinghue
510 COMPOSITE_HSL_SATURATION = 25, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingsaturation
511 COMPOSITE_HSL_COLOR = 26, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingcolor
512 COMPOSITE_HSL_LUMINOSITY = 27, // https://www.w3.org/TR/compositing-1/#blendingluminosity
513 };
514 public:
515 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (1);
516};
517
518struct Affine2x3
519{
520 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
521 {
522 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
523 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
524 }
525
526 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
527 {
528 c->funcs->push_transform (paint_data: c->data,
529 xx: xx.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0)),
530 yx: yx.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1)),
531 xy: xy.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 2)),
532 yy: yy.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 3)),
533 dx: dx.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 4)),
534 dy: dy.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 5)));
535 }
536
537 F16DOT16 xx;
538 F16DOT16 yx;
539 F16DOT16 xy;
540 F16DOT16 yy;
541 F16DOT16 dx;
542 F16DOT16 dy;
543 public:
544 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (6 * F16DOT16::static_size);
545};
546
547struct PaintColrLayers
548{
549 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
550
551 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
552 {
553 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
554 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
555 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
556 return_trace (c->serializer->check_assign (out->firstLayerIndex, c->plan->colrv1_layers.get (firstLayerIndex),
557 HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW));
558
559 return_trace (true);
560 }
561
562 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
563 {
564 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
565 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
566 }
567
568 inline void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const;
569
570 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 1 */
571 HBUINT8 numLayers;
572 HBUINT32 firstLayerIndex; /* index into COLRv1::layerList */
573 public:
574 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (6);
575};
576
577struct PaintSolid
578{
579 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
580 { c->add_palette_index (palette_index: paletteIndex); }
581
582 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
583 {
584 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
585 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: *this);
586 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
587 return_trace (c->serializer->check_assign (out->paletteIndex, c->plan->colr_palettes.get (paletteIndex),
588 HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW));
589 }
590
591 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
592 {
593 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
594 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
595 }
596
597 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
598 {
599 hb_bool_t is_foreground;
600 hb_color_t color;
601
602 color = c->get_color (color_index: paletteIndex,
603 alpha: alpha.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0)),
604 is_foreground: &is_foreground);
605 c->funcs->color (paint_data: c->data, is_foreground, color);
606 }
607
608 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 2(noVar) or 3(Var)*/
609 HBUINT16 paletteIndex;
610 F2DOT14 alpha;
611 public:
612 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (3 + F2DOT14::static_size);
613};
614
615template <template<typename> class Var>
616struct PaintLinearGradient
617{
618 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
619 { (this+colorLine).closurev1 (c); }
620
621 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
622 {
623 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
624 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (this);
625 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
626
627 return_trace (out->colorLine.serialize_subset (c, colorLine, this));
628 }
629
630 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
631 {
632 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
633 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && colorLine.sanitize (c, this));
634 }
635
636 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
637 {
638 hb_color_line_t cl = {
639 (void *) &(this+colorLine),
640 (this+colorLine).static_get_color_stops, c,
641 (this+colorLine).static_get_extend, nullptr
642 };
643
644 c->funcs->linear_gradient (paint_data: c->data, color_line: &cl,
645 x0: x0 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0),
646 y0: y0 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1),
647 x1: x1 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 2),
648 y1: y1 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 3),
649 x2: x2 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 4),
650 y2: y2 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 5));
651 }
652
653 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 4(noVar) or 5 (Var) */
654 Offset24To<ColorLine<Var>> colorLine; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintLinearGradient
655 * table) to ColorLine subtable. */
656 FWORD x0;
657 FWORD y0;
658 FWORD x1;
659 FWORD y1;
660 FWORD x2;
661 FWORD y2;
662 public:
663 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 6 * FWORD::static_size);
664};
665
666template <template<typename> class Var>
667struct PaintRadialGradient
668{
669 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
670 { (this+colorLine).closurev1 (c); }
671
672 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
673 {
674 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
675 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (this);
676 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
677
678 return_trace (out->colorLine.serialize_subset (c, colorLine, this));
679 }
680
681 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
682 {
683 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
684 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && colorLine.sanitize (c, this));
685 }
686
687 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
688 {
689 hb_color_line_t cl = {
690 (void *) &(this+colorLine),
691 (this+colorLine).static_get_color_stops, c,
692 (this+colorLine).static_get_extend, nullptr
693 };
694
695 c->funcs->radial_gradient (paint_data: c->data, color_line: &cl,
696 x0: x0 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0),
697 y0: y0 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1),
698 r0: radius0 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 2),
699 x1: x1 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 3),
700 y1: y1 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 4),
701 r1: radius1 + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 5));
702 }
703
704 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 6(noVar) or 7 (Var) */
705 Offset24To<ColorLine<Var>> colorLine; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintRadialGradient
706 * table) to ColorLine subtable. */
707 FWORD x0;
708 FWORD y0;
709 UFWORD radius0;
710 FWORD x1;
711 FWORD y1;
712 UFWORD radius1;
713 public:
714 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 6 * FWORD::static_size);
715};
716
717template <template<typename> class Var>
718struct PaintSweepGradient
719{
720 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const
721 { (this+colorLine).closurev1 (c); }
722
723 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
724 {
725 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
726 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (this);
727 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
728
729 return_trace (out->colorLine.serialize_subset (c, colorLine, this));
730 }
731
732 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
733 {
734 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
735 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && colorLine.sanitize (c, this));
736 }
737
738 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
739 {
740 hb_color_line_t cl = {
741 (void *) &(this+colorLine),
742 (this+colorLine).static_get_color_stops, c,
743 (this+colorLine).static_get_extend, nullptr
744 };
745
746 c->funcs->sweep_gradient (paint_data: c->data, color_line: &cl,
747 x0: centerX + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0),
748 y0: centerY + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1),
749 start_angle: (startAngle.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 2)) + 1) * (float) M_PI,
750 end_angle: (endAngle.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 3)) + 1) * (float) M_PI);
751 }
752
753 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 8(noVar) or 9 (Var) */
754 Offset24To<ColorLine<Var>> colorLine; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintSweepGradient
755 * table) to ColorLine subtable. */
756 FWORD centerX;
757 FWORD centerY;
758 F2DOT14 startAngle;
759 F2DOT14 endAngle;
760 public:
761 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 2 * FWORD::static_size + 2 * F2DOT14::static_size);
762};
763
764// Paint a non-COLR glyph, filled as indicated by paint.
765struct PaintGlyph
766{
767 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
768
769 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
770 {
771 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
772 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
773 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
774
775 if (! c->serializer->check_assign (v1&: out->gid, v2: c->plan->glyph_map->get (key: gid),
776 err_type: HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW))
777 return_trace (false);
778
779 return_trace (out->paint.serialize_subset (c, paint, this));
780 }
781
782 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
783 {
784 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
785 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && paint.sanitize (c, this));
786 }
787
788 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
789 {
790 c->funcs->push_inverse_root_transform (paint_data: c->data, font: c->font);
791 c->funcs->push_clip_glyph (paint_data: c->data, glyph: gid, font: c->font);
792 c->funcs->push_root_transform (paint_data: c->data, font: c->font);
793 c->recurse (paint: this+paint);
794 c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
795 c->funcs->pop_clip (paint_data: c->data);
796 c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
797 }
798
799 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 10 */
800 Offset24To<Paint> paint; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintGlyph table) to Paint subtable. */
801 HBUINT16 gid;
802 public:
803 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (6);
804};
805
806struct PaintColrGlyph
807{
808 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
809
810 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
811 {
812 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
813 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
814 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
815
816 return_trace (c->serializer->check_assign (out->gid, c->plan->glyph_map->get (gid),
817 HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW));
818 }
819
820 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
821 {
822 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
823 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
824 }
825
826 inline void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const;
827
828 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 11 */
829 HBUINT16 gid;
830 public:
831 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (3);
832};
833
834template <template<typename> class Var>
835struct PaintTransform
836{
837 HB_INTERNAL void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
838
839 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
840 {
841 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
842 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (this);
843 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
844 if (!out->transform.serialize_copy (c->serializer, transform, this)) return_trace (false);
845 return_trace (out->src.serialize_subset (c, src, this));
846 }
847
848 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
849 {
850 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
851 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
852 src.sanitize (c, this) &&
853 transform.sanitize (c, this));
854 }
855
856 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
857 {
858 (this+transform).paint_glyph (c);
859 c->recurse (paint: this+src);
860 c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
861 }
862
863 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 12(noVar) or 13 (Var) */
864 Offset24To<Paint> src; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintTransform table) to Paint subtable. */
865 Offset24To<Var<Affine2x3>> transform;
866 public:
867 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (7);
868};
869
870struct PaintTranslate
871{
872 HB_INTERNAL void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
873
874 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
875 {
876 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
877 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
878 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
879
880 return_trace (out->src.serialize_subset (c, src, this));
881 }
882
883 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
884 {
885 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
886 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && src.sanitize (c, this));
887 }
888
889 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
890 {
891 float ddx = dx + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0);
892 float ddy = dy + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1);
893
894 bool p1 = c->funcs->push_translate (paint_data: c->data, dx: ddx, dy: ddy);
895 c->recurse (paint: this+src);
896 if (p1) c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
897 }
898
899 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 14(noVar) or 15 (Var) */
900 Offset24To<Paint> src; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintTranslate table) to Paint subtable. */
901 FWORD dx;
902 FWORD dy;
903 public:
904 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 2 * FWORD::static_size);
905};

924 }
925
926 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
927 {
928 float sx = scaleX.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0));
929 float sy = scaleY.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1));
930
931 bool p1 = c->funcs->push_scale (paint_data: c->data, sx, sy);
932 c->recurse (paint: this+src);

940 public:

942};
943
944struct PaintScaleAroundCenter
945{
946 HB_INTERNAL void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
947
948 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
949 {
950 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
951 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
952 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
953
954 return_trace (out->src.serialize_subset (c, src, this));
955 }
956
957 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
958 {
959 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
960 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && src.sanitize (c, this));
961 }
962
963 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c, uint32_t varIdxBase) const
964 {
965 float sx = scaleX.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 0));
966 float sy = scaleY.to_float (offset: c->instancer (varIdxBase, 1));
967 float tCenterX = centerX + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 2);
968 float tCenterY = centerY + c->instancer (varIdxBase, 3);
969
970 bool p1 = c->funcs->push_translate (paint_data: c->data, dx: +tCenterX, dy: +tCenterY);
971 bool p2 = c->funcs->push_scale (paint_data: c->data, sx, sy);
972 bool p3 = c->funcs->push_translate (paint_data: c->data, dx: -tCenterX, dy: -tCenterY);
973 c->recurse (paint: this+src);
974 if (p3) c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
975 if (p2) c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
976 if (p1) c->funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c->data);
977 }
978
979 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 18 (noVar) or 19(Var) */
980 Offset24To<Paint> src; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintScaleAroundCenter table) to Paint subtable. */
981 F2DOT14 scaleX;
982 F2DOT14 scaleY;
983 FWORD centerX;
984 FWORD centerY;
985 public:
986 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 2 * F2DOT14::static_size + 2 * FWORD::static_size);
987};

1223 public:
1224 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (4 + 2 * F2DOT14::static_size + 2 * FWORD::static_size);
1225};
1226
1227struct PaintComposite
1228{
1229 void closurev1 (hb_colrv1_closure_context_t* c) const;
1230
1231 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1232 {
1233 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
1234 auto *out = c->serializer->embed (obj: this);
1235 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
1236
1237 if (!out->src.serialize_subset (c, src, src_base: this)) return_trace (false);
1238 return_trace (out->backdrop.serialize_subset (c, backdrop, this));
1239 }
1240
1241 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1242 {
1243 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1244 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
1245 src.sanitize (c, this) &&
1246 backdrop.sanitize (c, this));
1247 }
1248
1249 void paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
1250 {
1251 c->recurse (paint: this+backdrop);
1252 c->funcs->push_group (paint_data: c->data);
1253 c->recurse (paint: this+src);
1254 c->funcs->pop_group (paint_data: c->data, mode: (hb_paint_composite_mode_t) (int) mode);
1255 }
1256
1257 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 32 */
1258 Offset24To<Paint> src; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintComposite table) to source Paint subtable. */
1259 CompositeMode mode; /* If mode is unrecognized use COMPOSITE_CLEAR */
1260 Offset24To<Paint> backdrop; /* Offset (from beginning of PaintComposite table) to backdrop Paint subtable. */
1261 public:
1262 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (8);
1263};
1264
1265struct ClipBoxData
1266{
1267 int xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax;
1268};
1269
1270struct ClipBoxFormat1
1271{
1272 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1273 {
1274 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1275 return_trace (c->check_struct (this));
1276 }
1277
1278 void get_clip_box (ClipBoxData &clip_box, const VarStoreInstancer &instancer HB_UNUSED) const
1279 {
1280 clip_box.xMin = xMin;
1281 clip_box.yMin = yMin;
1282 clip_box.xMax = xMax;
1283 clip_box.yMax = yMax;
1284 }
1285
1286 public:
1287 HBUINT8 format; /* format = 1(noVar) or 2(Var)*/
1288 FWORD xMin;
1289 FWORD yMin;
1290 FWORD xMax;
1291 FWORD yMax;
1292 public:
1293 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (1 + 4 * FWORD::static_size);
1294};
1295
1296struct ClipBoxFormat2 : Variable<ClipBoxFormat1>
1297{
1298 void get_clip_box (ClipBoxData &clip_box, const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
1299 {
1300 value.get_clip_box(clip_box, instancer);
1301 if (instancer)
1302 {
1303 clip_box.xMin += _hb_roundf (x: instancer (varIdxBase, 0));
1304 clip_box.yMin += _hb_roundf (x: instancer (varIdxBase, 1));
1305 clip_box.xMax += _hb_roundf (x: instancer (varIdxBase, 2));
1306 clip_box.yMax += _hb_roundf (x: instancer (varIdxBase, 3));
1307 }
1308 }
1309};
1310
1311struct ClipBox
1312{
1313 ClipBox* copy (hb_serialize_context_t *c) const
1314 {
1315 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
1316 switch (u.format) {
1317 case 1: return_trace (reinterpret_cast<ClipBox *> (c->embed (u.format1)));
1318 case 2: return_trace (reinterpret_cast<ClipBox *> (c->embed (u.format2)));
1319 default:return_trace (nullptr);
1320 }
1321 }
1322
1323 template <typename context_t, typename ...Ts>
1324 typename context_t::return_t dispatch (context_t *c, Ts&&... ds) const
1325 {
1326 if (unlikely (!c->may_dispatch (this, &u.format))) return c->no_dispatch_return_value ();
1327 TRACE_DISPATCH (this, u.format);
1328 switch (u.format) {
1329 case 1: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.format1, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1330 case 2: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.format2, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1331 default:return_trace (c->default_return_value ());
1332 }
1333 }
1334
1335 bool get_extents (hb_glyph_extents_t *extents,
1336 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
1337 {
1338 ClipBoxData clip_box;
1339 switch (u.format) {
1340 case 1:
1341 u.format1.get_clip_box (clip_box, instancer);
1342 break;
1343 case 2:
1344 u.format2.get_clip_box (clip_box, instancer);
1345 break;
1346 default:
1347 return false;
1348 }
1349
1350 extents->x_bearing = clip_box.xMin;
1351 extents->y_bearing = clip_box.yMax;
1352 extents->width = clip_box.xMax - clip_box.xMin;
1353 extents->height = clip_box.yMin - clip_box.yMax;
1354 return true;
1355 }
1356
1357 protected:
1358 union {
1359 HBUINT8 format; /* Format identifier */
1360 ClipBoxFormat1 format1;
1361 ClipBoxFormat2 format2;
1362 } u;
1363};
1364
1365struct ClipRecord
1366{
1367 int cmp (hb_codepoint_t g) const
1368 { return g < startGlyphID ? -1 : g <= endGlyphID ? 0 : +1; }
1369
1370 ClipRecord* copy (hb_serialize_context_t *c, const void *base) const
1371 {
1372 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
1373 auto *out = c->embed (obj: this);
1374 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (nullptr);
1375 if (!out->clipBox.serialize_copy (c, src: clipBox, src_base: base)) return_trace (nullptr);
1376 return_trace (out);
1377 }
1378
1379 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c, const void *base) const
1380 {
1381 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1382 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && clipBox.sanitize (c, base));
1383 }
1384
1385 bool get_extents (hb_glyph_extents_t *extents,
1386 const void *base,
1387 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
1388 {
1389 return (base+clipBox).get_extents (extents, instancer);
1390 }
1391
1392 public:
1393 HBUINT16 startGlyphID; // first gid clip applies to
1394 HBUINT16 endGlyphID; // last gid clip applies to, inclusive
1395 Offset24To<ClipBox> clipBox; // Box or VarBox
1396 public:
1397 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (7);
1398};
1399DECLARE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, ClipRecord);
1400
1401struct ClipList
1402{
1403 unsigned serialize_clip_records (hb_serialize_context_t *c,
1404 const hb_set_t& gids,
1405 const hb_map_t& gid_offset_map) const
1406 {
1407 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
1408 if (gids.is_empty () ||
1409 gid_offset_map.get_population () != gids.get_population ())
1410 return_trace (0);
1411
1412 unsigned count = 0;
1413
1414 hb_codepoint_t start_gid= gids.get_min ();
1415 hb_codepoint_t prev_gid = start_gid;
1416
1417 unsigned offset = gid_offset_map.get (key: start_gid);
1418 unsigned prev_offset = offset;
1419 for (const hb_codepoint_t _ : gids.iter ())
1420 {
1421 if (_ == start_gid) continue;
1422
1423 offset = gid_offset_map.get (key: _);
1424 if (_ == prev_gid + 1 && offset == prev_offset)
1425 {
1426 prev_gid = _;
1427 continue;
1428 }
1429
1430 ClipRecord record;
1431 record.startGlyphID = start_gid;
1432 record.endGlyphID = prev_gid;
1433 record.clipBox = prev_offset;
1434
1435 if (!c->copy (src: record, ds: this)) return_trace (0);
1436 count++;
1437
1438 start_gid = _;
1439 prev_gid = _;
1440 prev_offset = offset;
1441 }
1442
1443 //last one
1444 {
1445 ClipRecord record;
1446 record.startGlyphID = start_gid;
1447 record.endGlyphID = prev_gid;
1448 record.clipBox = prev_offset;
1449 if (!c->copy (src: record, ds: this)) return_trace (0);
1450 count++;
1451 }
1452 return_trace (count);
1453 }
1454
1455 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1456 {
1457 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
1458 auto *out = c->serializer->start_embed (obj: *this);
1459 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (out))) return_trace (false);
1460 if (!c->serializer->check_assign (v1&: out->format, v2: format, err_type: HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW)) return_trace (false);
1461
1462 const hb_set_t& glyphset = c->plan->_glyphset_colred;
1463 const hb_map_t &glyph_map = *c->plan->glyph_map;
1464
1465 hb_map_t new_gid_offset_map;
1466 hb_set_t new_gids;
1467 for (const ClipRecord& record : clips.iter ())
1468 {
1469 unsigned start_gid = record.startGlyphID;
1470 unsigned end_gid = record.endGlyphID;
1471 for (unsigned gid = start_gid; gid <= end_gid; gid++)
1472 {
1473 if (!glyphset.has (k: gid) || !glyph_map.has (key: gid)) continue;
1474 unsigned new_gid = glyph_map.get (key: gid);
1475 new_gid_offset_map.set (key: new_gid, value: record.clipBox);
1476 new_gids.add (g: new_gid);
1477 }
1478 }
1479
1480 unsigned count = serialize_clip_records (c: c->serializer, gids: new_gids, gid_offset_map: new_gid_offset_map);
1481 if (!count) return_trace (false);
1482 return_trace (c->serializer->check_assign (out->clips.len, count, HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW));
1483 }
1484
1485 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1486 {
1487 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1488 // TODO Make a formatted struct!
1489 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) && clips.sanitize (c, this));
1490 }
1491
1492 bool
1493 get_extents (hb_codepoint_t gid,
1494 hb_glyph_extents_t *extents,
1495 const VarStoreInstancer &instancer) const
1496 {
1497 auto *rec = clips.as_array ().bsearch (x: gid);
1498 if (rec)
1499 {
1500 rec->get_extents (extents, base: this, instancer);
1501 return true;
1502 }
1503 return false;
1504 }
1505
1506 HBUINT8 format; // Set to 1.
1507 SortedArray32Of<ClipRecord> clips; // Clip records, sorted by startGlyphID
1508 public:
1509 DEFINE_SIZE_ARRAY_SIZED (5, clips);
1510};
1511
1512struct Paint
1513{
1514
1515 template <typename ...Ts>
1516 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c, Ts&&... ds) const
1517 {
1518 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1519
1520 if (unlikely (!c->check_start_recursion (HB_MAX_NESTING_LEVEL)))
1521 return_trace (c->no_dispatch_return_value ());
1522
1523 return_trace (c->end_recursion (this->dispatch (c, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...)));
1524 }
1525
1526 template <typename context_t, typename ...Ts>
1527 typename context_t::return_t dispatch (context_t *c, Ts&&... ds) const
1528 {
1529 if (unlikely (!c->may_dispatch (this, &u.format))) return c->no_dispatch_return_value ();
1530 TRACE_DISPATCH (this, u.format);
1531 switch (u.format) {
1532 case 1: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat1, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1533 case 2: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat2, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1534 case 3: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat3, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1535 case 4: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat4, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1536 case 5: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat5, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1537 case 6: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat6, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1538 case 7: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat7, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1539 case 8: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat8, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1540 case 9: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat9, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1541 case 10: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat10, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1542 case 11: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat11, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1543 case 12: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat12, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1544 case 13: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat13, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1545 case 14: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat14, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1546 case 15: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat15, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1547 case 16: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat16, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1548 case 17: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat17, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1549 case 18: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat18, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1550 case 19: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat19, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1551 case 20: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat20, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1552 case 21: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat21, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1553 case 22: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat22, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1554 case 23: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat23, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1555 case 24: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat24, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1556 case 25: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat25, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1557 case 26: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat26, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1558 case 27: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat27, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1559 case 28: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat28, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1560 case 29: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat29, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1561 case 30: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat30, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1562 case 31: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat31, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1563 case 32: return_trace (c->dispatch (u.paintformat32, std::forward<Ts> (ds)...));
1564 default:return_trace (c->default_return_value ());
1565 }
1566 }
1567
1568 protected:
1569 union {
1570 HBUINT8 format;
1571 PaintColrLayers paintformat1;
1572 NoVariable<PaintSolid> paintformat2;
1573 Variable<PaintSolid> paintformat3;
1574 NoVariable<PaintLinearGradient<NoVariable>> paintformat4;
1575 Variable<PaintLinearGradient<Variable>> paintformat5;
1576 NoVariable<PaintRadialGradient<NoVariable>> paintformat6;
1577 Variable<PaintRadialGradient<Variable>> paintformat7;
1578 NoVariable<PaintSweepGradient<NoVariable>> paintformat8;
1579 Variable<PaintSweepGradient<Variable>> paintformat9;
1580 PaintGlyph paintformat10;
1581 PaintColrGlyph paintformat11;
1582 PaintTransform<NoVariable> paintformat12;
1583 PaintTransform<Variable> paintformat13;
1584 NoVariable<PaintTranslate> paintformat14;
1585 Variable<PaintTranslate> paintformat15;
1586 NoVariable<PaintScale> paintformat16;
1587 Variable<PaintScale> paintformat17;
1588 NoVariable<PaintScaleAroundCenter> paintformat18;
1589 Variable<PaintScaleAroundCenter> paintformat19;
1590 NoVariable<PaintScaleUniform> paintformat20;
1591 Variable<PaintScaleUniform> paintformat21;
1592 NoVariable<PaintScaleUniformAroundCenter> paintformat22;
1593 Variable<PaintScaleUniformAroundCenter> paintformat23;
1594 NoVariable<PaintRotate> paintformat24;
1595 Variable<PaintRotate> paintformat25;
1596 NoVariable<PaintRotateAroundCenter> paintformat26;
1597 Variable<PaintRotateAroundCenter> paintformat27;
1598 NoVariable<PaintSkew> paintformat28;
1599 Variable<PaintSkew> paintformat29;
1600 NoVariable<PaintSkewAroundCenter> paintformat30;
1601 Variable<PaintSkewAroundCenter> paintformat31;
1602 PaintComposite paintformat32;
1603 } u;
1604 public:
1605 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (2);
1606};

1608struct BaseGlyphPaintRecord
1609{
1610 int cmp (hb_codepoint_t g) const
1611 { return g < glyphId ? -1 : g > glyphId ? 1 : 0; }
1612
1613 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *s, const hb_map_t* glyph_map,
1614 const void* src_base, hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1615 {
1616 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
1617 auto *out = s->embed (obj: this);
1618 if (unlikely (!out)) return_trace (false);
1619 if (!s->check_assign (v1&: out->glyphId, v2: glyph_map->get (key: glyphId),
1620 err_type: HB_SERIALIZE_ERROR_INT_OVERFLOW))
1621 return_trace (false);
1622
1623 return_trace (out->paint.serialize_subset (c, paint, src_base));
1624 }
1625
1626 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c, const void *base) const
1627 {
1628 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1629 return_trace (likely (c->check_struct (this) && paint.sanitize (c, base)));
1630 }
1631
1632 public:
1633 HBGlyphID16 glyphId; /* Glyph ID of reference glyph */
1634 Offset32To<Paint> paint; /* Offset (from beginning of BaseGlyphPaintRecord array) to Paint,
1635 * Typically PaintColrLayers */
1636 public:
1637 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (6);
1638};
1639
1640struct BaseGlyphList : SortedArray32Of<BaseGlyphPaintRecord>
1641{
1642 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1643 {
1644 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
1645 auto *out = c->serializer->start_embed (obj: this);
1646 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (out))) return_trace (false);
1647 const hb_set_t* glyphset = &c->plan->_glyphset_colred;
1648
1649 for (const auto& _ : as_array ())
1650 {
1651 unsigned gid = _.glyphId;
1652 if (!glyphset->has (k: gid)) continue;
1653
1654 if (_.serialize (s: c->serializer, glyph_map: c->plan->glyph_map, src_base: this, c)) out->len++;
1655 else return_trace (false);
1656 }
1657
1658 return_trace (out->len != 0);
1659 }
1660
1661 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1662 {
1663 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1664 return_trace (SortedArray32Of<BaseGlyphPaintRecord>::sanitize (c, this));
1665 }
1666};
1667
1668struct LayerList : Array32OfOffset32To<Paint>
1669{
1670 const Paint& get_paint (unsigned i) const
1671 { return this+(*this)[i]; }
1672
1673 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1674 {
1675 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
1676 auto *out = c->serializer->start_embed (obj: this);
1677 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (out))) return_trace (false);
1678
1679 for (const auto& _ : + hb_enumerate (*this)
1680 | hb_filter (c->plan->colrv1_layers, hb_first))
1681
1682 {
1683 auto *o = out->serialize_append (c: c->serializer);
1684 if (unlikely (!o) || !o->serialize_subset (c, src: _.second, src_base: this))
1685 return_trace (false);
1686 }
1687 return_trace (true);
1688 }
1689
1690 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1691 {
1692 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1693 return_trace (Array32OfOffset32To<Paint>::sanitize (c, this));
1694 }
1695};
1696
1697struct COLR
1698{
1699 static constexpr hb_tag_t tableTag = HB_OT_TAG_COLR;
1700
1701 bool has_v0_data () const { return numBaseGlyphs; }
1702 bool has_v1_data () const
1703 {
1704 if (version == 1)
1705 return (this+baseGlyphList).len > 0;
1706
1707 return false;
1708 }
1709
1710 unsigned int get_glyph_layers (hb_codepoint_t glyph,
1711 unsigned int start_offset,
1712 unsigned int *count, /* IN/OUT. May be NULL. */
1713 hb_ot_color_layer_t *layers /* OUT. May be NULL. */) const
1714 {
1715 const BaseGlyphRecord &record = (this+baseGlyphsZ).bsearch (len: numBaseGlyphs, x: glyph);
1716
1717 hb_array_t<const LayerRecord> all_layers = (this+layersZ).as_array (len: numLayers);
1718 hb_array_t<const LayerRecord> glyph_layers = all_layers.sub_array (start_offset: record.firstLayerIdx,
1719 seg_count: record.numLayers);
1720 if (count)
1721 {
1722 + glyph_layers.sub_array (start_offset, seg_count: count)
1723 | hb_sink (hb_array (array: layers, length: *count))
1724 ;
1725 }
1726 return glyph_layers.length;
1727 }
1728
1729 struct accelerator_t
1730 {
1731 accelerator_t (hb_face_t *face)
1732 { colr = hb_sanitize_context_t ().reference_table<COLR> (face); }
1733 ~accelerator_t () { this->colr.destroy (); }
1734
1735 bool is_valid () { return colr.get_blob ()->length; }
1736
1737 void closure_glyphs (hb_codepoint_t glyph,
1738 hb_set_t *related_ids /* OUT */) const
1739 { colr->closure_glyphs (glyph, related_ids); }
1740
1741 void closure_V0palette_indices (const hb_set_t *glyphs,
1742 hb_set_t *palettes /* OUT */) const
1743 { colr->closure_V0palette_indices (glyphs, palettes); }
1744
1745 void closure_forV1 (hb_set_t *glyphset,
1746 hb_set_t *layer_indices,
1747 hb_set_t *palette_indices) const
1748 { colr->closure_forV1 (glyphset, layer_indices, palette_indices); }
1749
1750 private:
1751 hb_blob_ptr_t<COLR> colr;
1752 };
1753
1754 void closure_glyphs (hb_codepoint_t glyph,
1755 hb_set_t *related_ids /* OUT */) const
1756 {
1757 const BaseGlyphRecord *record = get_base_glyph_record (gid: glyph);
1758 if (!record) return;
1759
1760 auto glyph_layers = (this+layersZ).as_array (len: numLayers).sub_array (start_offset: record->firstLayerIdx,
1761 seg_count: record->numLayers);
1762 if (!glyph_layers.length) return;
1763 related_ids->add_array (array: &glyph_layers[0].glyphId, count: glyph_layers.length, stride: LayerRecord::min_size);
1764 }
1765
1766 void closure_V0palette_indices (const hb_set_t *glyphs,
1767 hb_set_t *palettes /* OUT */) const
1768 {
1769 if (!numBaseGlyphs || !numLayers) return;
1770 hb_array_t<const BaseGlyphRecord> baseGlyphs = (this+baseGlyphsZ).as_array (len: numBaseGlyphs);
1771 hb_array_t<const LayerRecord> all_layers = (this+layersZ).as_array (len: numLayers);
1772
1773 for (const BaseGlyphRecord record : baseGlyphs)
1774 {
1775 if (!glyphs->has (k: record.glyphId)) continue;
1776 hb_array_t<const LayerRecord> glyph_layers = all_layers.sub_array (start_offset: record.firstLayerIdx,
1777 seg_count: record.numLayers);
1778 for (const LayerRecord layer : glyph_layers)
1779 palettes->add (g: layer.colorIdx);
1780 }
1781 }
1782
1783 void closure_forV1 (hb_set_t *glyphset,
1784 hb_set_t *layer_indices,
1785 hb_set_t *palette_indices) const
1786 {
1787 if (version != 1) return;
1788 hb_set_t visited_glyphs;
1789
1790 hb_colrv1_closure_context_t c (this, &visited_glyphs, layer_indices, palette_indices);
1791 const BaseGlyphList &baseglyph_paintrecords = this+baseGlyphList;
1792
1793 for (const BaseGlyphPaintRecord &baseglyph_paintrecord: baseglyph_paintrecords.iter ())
1794 {
1795 unsigned gid = baseglyph_paintrecord.glyphId;
1796 if (!glyphset->has (k: gid)) continue;
1797
1798 const Paint &paint = &baseglyph_paintrecords+baseglyph_paintrecord.paint;
1799 paint.dispatch (c: &c);
1800 }
1801 hb_set_union (set: glyphset, other: &visited_glyphs);
1802 }
1803
1804 const LayerList& get_layerList () const
1805 { return (this+layerList); }
1806
1807 const BaseGlyphList& get_baseglyphList () const
1808 { return (this+baseGlyphList); }
1809
1810 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
1811 {
1812 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
1813 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
1814 (this+baseGlyphsZ).sanitize (c, numBaseGlyphs) &&
1815 (this+layersZ).sanitize (c, numLayers) &&
1816 (version == 0 ||
1817 (version == 1 &&
1818 baseGlyphList.sanitize (c, this) &&
1819 layerList.sanitize (c, this) &&
1820 clipList.sanitize (c, this) &&
1821 varIdxMap.sanitize (c, this) &&
1822 varStore.sanitize (c, this))));
1823 }
1824
1825 template<typename BaseIterator, typename LayerIterator,
1826 hb_requires (hb_is_iterator (BaseIterator)),
1827 hb_requires (hb_is_iterator (LayerIterator))>
1828 bool serialize_V0 (hb_serialize_context_t *c,
1829 unsigned version,
1830 BaseIterator base_it,
1831 LayerIterator layer_it)
1832 {
1833 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
1834 if (unlikely (base_it.len () != layer_it.len ()))
1835 return_trace (false);
1836
1837 this->version = version;
1838 numLayers = 0;
1839 numBaseGlyphs = base_it.len ();
1840 if (numBaseGlyphs == 0)
1841 {
1842 baseGlyphsZ = 0;
1843 layersZ = 0;
1844 return_trace (true);
1845 }
1846
1847 c->push ();
1848 for (const hb_item_type<BaseIterator> _ : + base_it.iter ())
1849 {
1850 auto* record = c->embed (_);
1851 if (unlikely (!record)) return_trace (false);
1852 record->firstLayerIdx = numLayers;
1853 numLayers += record->numLayers;
1854 }
1855 c->add_link (ofs&: baseGlyphsZ, objidx: c->pop_pack ());
1856
1857 c->push ();
1858 for (const hb_item_type<LayerIterator>& _ : + layer_it.iter ())
1859 _.as_array ().copy (c);
1860
1861 c->add_link (ofs&: layersZ, objidx: c->pop_pack ());
1862
1863 return_trace (true);
1864 }
1865
1866 const BaseGlyphRecord* get_base_glyph_record (hb_codepoint_t gid) const
1867 {
1868 const BaseGlyphRecord* record = &(this+baseGlyphsZ).bsearch (len: numBaseGlyphs, x: (unsigned int) gid);
1869 if (record == &Null (BaseGlyphRecord) ||
1870 (record && (hb_codepoint_t) record->glyphId != gid))
1871 record = nullptr;
1872 return record;
1873 }
1874
1875 const BaseGlyphPaintRecord* get_base_glyph_paintrecord (hb_codepoint_t gid) const
1876 {
1877 const BaseGlyphPaintRecord* record = &(this+baseGlyphList).bsearch (x: (unsigned) gid);
1878 if ((record && (hb_codepoint_t) record->glyphId != gid))
1879 record = nullptr;
1880 return record;
1881 }
1882
1883 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
1884 {
1885 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
1886
1887 const hb_map_t &reverse_glyph_map = *c->plan->reverse_glyph_map;
1888 const hb_set_t& glyphset = c->plan->_glyphset_colred;
1889
1890 auto base_it =
1891 + hb_range (c->plan->num_output_glyphs ())
1892 | hb_filter ([&](hb_codepoint_t new_gid)
1893 {
1894 hb_codepoint_t old_gid = reverse_glyph_map.get (key: new_gid);
1895 if (glyphset.has (k: old_gid)) return true;
1896 return false;
1897 })
1898 | hb_map_retains_sorting ([&](hb_codepoint_t new_gid)
1899 {
1900 hb_codepoint_t old_gid = reverse_glyph_map.get (key: new_gid);
1901
1902 const BaseGlyphRecord* old_record = get_base_glyph_record (gid: old_gid);
1903 if (unlikely (!old_record))
1904 return hb_pair_t<bool, BaseGlyphRecord> (false, Null (BaseGlyphRecord));
1905 BaseGlyphRecord new_record = {};
1906 new_record.glyphId = new_gid;
1907 new_record.numLayers = old_record->numLayers;
1908 return hb_pair_t<bool, BaseGlyphRecord> (true, new_record);
1909 })
1910 | hb_filter (hb_first)
1911 | hb_map_retains_sorting (hb_second)
1912 ;
1913
1914 auto layer_it =
1915 + hb_range (c->plan->num_output_glyphs ())
1916 | hb_map (reverse_glyph_map)
1917 | hb_filter (glyphset)
1918 | hb_map_retains_sorting ([&](hb_codepoint_t old_gid)
1919 {
1920 const BaseGlyphRecord* old_record = get_base_glyph_record (gid: old_gid);
1921 hb_vector_t<LayerRecord> out_layers;
1922
1923 if (unlikely (!old_record ||
1924 old_record->firstLayerIdx >= numLayers ||
1925 old_record->firstLayerIdx + old_record->numLayers > numLayers))
1926 return hb_pair_t<bool, hb_vector_t<LayerRecord>> (false, out_layers);
1927
1928 auto layers = (this+layersZ).as_array (len: numLayers).sub_array (start_offset: old_record->firstLayerIdx,
1929 seg_count: old_record->numLayers);
1930 out_layers.resize (size_: layers.length);
1931 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < layers.length; i++) {
1932 out_layers[i] = layers[i];
1933 hb_codepoint_t new_gid = 0;
1934 if (unlikely (!c->plan->new_gid_for_old_gid (out_layers[i].glyphId, &new_gid)))
1935 return hb_pair_t<bool, hb_vector_t<LayerRecord>> (false, out_layers);
1936 out_layers[i].glyphId = new_gid;
1937 out_layers[i].colorIdx = c->plan->colr_palettes.get (key: layers[i].colorIdx);
1938 }
1939
1940 return hb_pair_t<bool, hb_vector_t<LayerRecord>> (true, out_layers);
1941 })
1942 | hb_filter (hb_first)
1943 | hb_map_retains_sorting (hb_second)
1944 ;
1945
1946 if (version == 0 && (!base_it || !layer_it))
1947 return_trace (false);
1948
1949 COLR *colr_prime = c->serializer->start_embed<COLR> ();
1950 if (unlikely (!c->serializer->extend_min (colr_prime))) return_trace (false);
1951
1952 if (version == 0)
1953 return_trace (colr_prime->serialize_V0 (c->serializer, version, base_it, layer_it));
1954
1955 auto snap = c->serializer->snapshot ();
1956 if (!c->serializer->allocate_size<void> (size: 5 * HBUINT32::static_size)) return_trace (false);
1957 if (!colr_prime->baseGlyphList.serialize_subset (c, src: baseGlyphList, src_base: this))
1958 {
1959 if (c->serializer->in_error ()) return_trace (false);
1960 //no more COLRv1 glyphs: downgrade to version 0
1961 c->serializer->revert (snap);
1962 return_trace (colr_prime->serialize_V0 (c->serializer, 0, base_it, layer_it));
1963 }
1964
1965 if (!colr_prime->serialize_V0 (c: c->serializer, version, base_it, layer_it)) return_trace (false);
1966
1967 colr_prime->layerList.serialize_subset (c, src: layerList, src_base: this);
1968 colr_prime->clipList.serialize_subset (c, src: clipList, src_base: this);
1969 colr_prime->varIdxMap.serialize_copy (c: c->serializer, src: varIdxMap, src_base: this);
1970 colr_prime->varStore.serialize_copy (c: c->serializer, src: varStore, src_base: this);
1971 return_trace (true);
1972 }
1973
1974 const Paint *get_base_glyph_paint (hb_codepoint_t glyph) const
1975 {
1976 const BaseGlyphList &baseglyph_paintrecords = this+baseGlyphList;
1977 const BaseGlyphPaintRecord* record = get_base_glyph_paintrecord (gid: glyph);
1978 if (record)
1979 {
1980 const Paint &paint = &baseglyph_paintrecords+record->paint;
1981 return &paint;
1982 }
1983 else
1984 return nullptr;
1985 }
1986
1987 bool
1988 get_extents (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t glyph, hb_glyph_extents_t *extents) const
1989 {
1990 if (version != 1)
1991 return false;
1992
1993 VarStoreInstancer instancer (this+varStore,
1994 this+varIdxMap,
1995 hb_array (array: font->coords, length: font->num_coords));
1996
1997 if (get_clip (glyph, extents, instancer))
1998 {
1999 font->scale_glyph_extents (extents);
2000 return true;
2001 }
2002
2003 auto *extents_funcs = hb_paint_extents_get_funcs ();
2004 hb_paint_extents_context_t extents_data;
2005 bool ret = paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: extents_funcs, data: &extents_data, palette_index: 0, HB_COLOR(0,0,0,0));
2006
2007 hb_extents_t e = extents_data.get_extents ();
2008 if (e.is_void ())
2009 {
2010 extents->x_bearing = 0;
2011 extents->y_bearing = 0;
2012 extents->width = 0;
2013 extents->height = 0;
2014 }
2015 else
2016 {
2017 extents->x_bearing = e.xmin;
2018 extents->y_bearing = e.ymax;
2019 extents->width = e.xmax - e.xmin;
2020 extents->height = e.ymin - e.ymax;
2021 }
2022
2023 return ret;
2024 }

2026 bool
2027 has_paint_for_glyph (hb_codepoint_t glyph) const
2028 {
2029 if (version == 1)
2030 {
2031 const Paint *paint = get_base_glyph_paint (glyph);
2032
2033 return paint != nullptr;
2034 }
2035
2036 return false;
2037 }
2038
2039 bool get_clip (hb_codepoint_t glyph,
2040 hb_glyph_extents_t *extents,
2041 const VarStoreInstancer instancer) const
2042 {
2043 return (this+clipList).get_extents (gid: glyph,
2044 extents,
2045 instancer);

2047
2048 bool
2049 paint_glyph (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t glyph, hb_paint_funcs_t *funcs, void *data, unsigned int palette_index, hb_color_t foreground, bool clip = true) const
2050 {
2051 VarStoreInstancer instancer (this+varStore,
2052 this+varIdxMap,
2053 hb_array (array: font->coords, length: font->num_coords));
2054 hb_paint_context_t c (this, funcs, data, font, palette_index, foreground, instancer);
2055
2056 if (version == 1)
2057 {
2058 const Paint *paint = get_base_glyph_paint (glyph);
2059 if (paint)
2060 {
2061 // COLRv1 glyph
2062
2063 VarStoreInstancer instancer (this+varStore,
2064 this+varIdxMap,
2065 hb_array (array: font->coords, length: font->num_coords));
2066
2067 bool is_bounded = true;
2068 if (clip)
2069 {
2070 hb_glyph_extents_t extents;
2071 if (get_clip (glyph, extents: &extents, instancer))
2072 {
2073 font->scale_glyph_extents (extents: &extents);
2074 c.funcs->push_clip_rectangle (paint_data: c.data,
2075 xmin: extents.x_bearing,
2076 ymin: extents.y_bearing + extents.height,
2077 xmax: extents.x_bearing + extents.width,
2078 ymax: extents.y_bearing);
2079 }
2080 else
2081 {
2082 auto *extents_funcs = hb_paint_extents_get_funcs ();
2083 hb_paint_extents_context_t extents_data;
2084
2085 paint_glyph (font, glyph,
2086 funcs: extents_funcs, data: &extents_data,
2087 palette_index, foreground,
2088 clip: false);
2089
2090 hb_extents_t extents = extents_data.get_extents ();
2091 is_bounded = extents_data.is_bounded ();
2092
2093 c.funcs->push_clip_rectangle (paint_data: c.data,
2094 xmin: extents.xmin,
2095 ymin: extents.ymin,
2096 xmax: extents.xmax,
2097 ymax: extents.ymax);
2098 }
2099 }
2100
2101 c.funcs->push_root_transform (paint_data: c.data, font);
2102
2103 if (is_bounded)
2104 c.recurse (paint: *paint);
2105
2106 c.funcs->pop_transform (paint_data: c.data);
2107
2108 if (clip)
2109 c.funcs->pop_clip (paint_data: c.data);
2110
2111 return true;
2112 }
2113 }
2114
2115 const BaseGlyphRecord *record = get_base_glyph_record (gid: glyph);
2116 if (record && ((hb_codepoint_t) record->glyphId == glyph))
2117 {
2118 // COLRv0 glyph
2119 for (const auto &r : (this+layersZ).as_array (len: numLayers)
2120 .sub_array (start_offset: record->firstLayerIdx, seg_count: record->numLayers))
2121 {
2122 hb_bool_t is_foreground;
2123 hb_color_t color = c.get_color (color_index: r.colorIdx, alpha: 1., is_foreground: &is_foreground);
2124 c.funcs->push_clip_glyph (paint_data: c.data, glyph: r.glyphId, font: c.font);
2125 c.funcs->color (paint_data: c.data, is_foreground, color);
2126 c.funcs->pop_clip (paint_data: c.data);
2127 }
2128
2129 return true;
2130 }
2131
2132 return false;
2133 }
2134
2135 protected:
2136 HBUINT16 version; /* Table version number (starts at 0). */
2137 HBUINT16 numBaseGlyphs; /* Number of Base Glyph Records. */
2138 NNOffset32To<SortedUnsizedArrayOf<BaseGlyphRecord>>
2139 baseGlyphsZ; /* Offset to Base Glyph records. */
2140 NNOffset32To<UnsizedArrayOf<LayerRecord>>
2141 layersZ; /* Offset to Layer Records. */
2142 HBUINT16 numLayers; /* Number of Layer Records. */
2143 // Version-1 additions
2144 Offset32To<BaseGlyphList> baseGlyphList;
2145 Offset32To<LayerList> layerList;
2146 Offset32To<ClipList> clipList; // Offset to ClipList table (may be NULL)
2147 Offset32To<DeltaSetIndexMap> varIdxMap; // Offset to DeltaSetIndexMap table (may be NULL)
2148 Offset32To<VariationStore> varStore;
2149 public:
2150 DEFINE_SIZE_MIN (14);
2151};

2157void
2158hb_paint_context_t::recurse (const Paint &paint)
2159{
2160 if (unlikely (depth_left <= 0 || edge_count <= 0)) return;
2161 depth_left--;
2162 edge_count--;
2163 paint.dispatch (c: this);
2164 depth_left++;
2165}

2167void PaintColrLayers::paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
2168{
2169 const LayerList &paint_offset_lists = c->get_colr_table ()->get_layerList ();
2170 for (unsigned i = firstLayerIndex; i < firstLayerIndex + numLayers; i++)
2171 {
2172 const Paint &paint = paint_offset_lists.get_paint (i);
2173 c->funcs->push_group (paint_data: c->data);
2174 c->recurse (paint);
2175 c->funcs->pop_group (paint_data: c->data, mode: HB_PAINT_COMPOSITE_MODE_SRC_OVER);
2176 }
2177}
2178
2179void PaintColrGlyph::paint_glyph (hb_paint_context_t *c) const
2180{
2181 const COLR *colr_table = c->get_colr_table ();
2182 const Paint *paint = colr_table->get_base_glyph_paint (glyph: gid);
2183
2184 hb_glyph_extents_t extents = {.x_bearing: 0};
2185 bool has_clip_box = colr_table->get_clip (glyph: gid, extents: &extents, instancer: c->instancer);
2186
2187 if (has_clip_box)
2188 c->funcs->push_clip_rectangle (paint_data: c->data,
2189 xmin: extents.x_bearing,
2190 ymin: extents.y_bearing + extents.height,
2191 xmax: extents.x_bearing + extents.width,
2192 ymax: extents.y_bearing);
2193
2194 if (paint)
2195 c->recurse (paint: *paint);
2196
2197 if (has_clip_box)
2198 c->funcs->pop_clip (paint_data: c->data);
2199}
